mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_ENUM_VALUE ( F_VALUE_ID, F_OWNER_ENUM_ID, F_CODE, F_TITLE, F_DESCRIPTION, F_NOTE ) VALUES ( #{ valueId }, #{ ownerEnumId }, #{ code }, #{ title }, #{ description }, #{ note } )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_ENUM_VALUE SET F_CODE = #{ code }, F_TITLE = #{ title }, F_DESCRIPTION = #{ description }, F_NOTE = #{ note } WHERE F_VALUE_ID = #{ valueId } AND F_OWNER_ENUM_ID = #{ ownerEnumId }
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM T_ENUM_VALUE WHERE F_VALUE_ID = #{ valueId } AND F_OWNER_ENUM_ID = #{ ownerEnumId }
mapper.select: SELECT F_VALUE_ID AS "valueId", F_OWNER_ENUM_ID AS "ownerEnumId", F_CODE AS "code", F_TITLE AS "title", F_DESCRIPTION AS "description", F_NOTE AS "note" FROM T_ENUM_VALUE WHERE F_VALUE_ID = #{ valueId } AND F_OWNER_ENUM_ID = #{ ownerEnumId }

SELECT F_ENUM_ID AS "enumId", F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID AS "ownerProjectId", F_ENUM_NAME AS "enumName", F_ENCODE_STRING AS "encodeString", F_TITLE AS "title", F_DESCRIPTION AS "description", F_NOTE AS "note" FROM T_ENUM WHERE F_ENUM_ID = #{ ownerEnumId }
